name: Space tourism multi-page website
description: This project is a fun collaboration with Scrimba and Kevin Powell! If you like, you can follow along and watch Kevin complete the project on Scrimba. Lots to learn!

name: Sunny agency landing page
description: This challenge will be a perfect test of your layout and responsive skills. There's a tiny bit of JS for the mobile menu, but the focus is HTML & CSS.

name: E-commerce product page
description: In this challenge, you'll build a beautiful product page. We'll be putting your JS skills to the test with a lightbox product gallery and cart fun

name: URL Shortening API
description: Integrate with the shrtcode URL shortening API and play with browser storage in this landing page challenge.

name: Ping single column
description: This challenge is great for beginners and offers a chance to practice basic client-side form validation.

name: Advice generator app
description: The perfect project if you're learning how to interact with 3rd-party APIs. This challenge uses the Advice Slip API to generate random quotes of advice.

name: Tip calculator app
description: This small app is perfect for anyone starting to get to grips with JavaScript. The calculator functionality will be a nice test!

name: Todo App
description: The classic todo app with a few twists! This app includes a dark/light theme toggle and drag & drop reordering for anyone wanting an extra test.

name: Rock, Paper, Scissors game
description: This challenge will test your HTML, CSS and JavaScript skills. There's even a Rock, Paper, Scissors, Lizard, Spock version if you really want to challenge yourself.

name: Interactive rating component
description: This is a nice, small project to practice handling user interactions and updating the DOM. Perfect for anyone who has learned the basics of JavaScript!

name: Order summary component
description: A perfect project for newbies who are starting to build confidence with layouts!

name: Loopstudios landing page
description: This challenge is perfect if you're looking to test your CSS Grid chops. Even without Grid, this project will be a fun one to help you practice your layout skills!

name: Intro component with sign-up form
description: Practice building out a sign-up form complete with client-side validation using JavaScript.

name: Blogr landing page
description: Flex your layout muscles with this landing page challenge. You'll mostly be working with HTML & CSS for this project with a tiny bit of JS for the mobile menu.

name: Easybank landing page
description: This challenge will provide a nice test for your layout skills. If you're ready to move up from Junior challenges, this one is a great next step.
